pageContext.claim: “This is not the Obama Administration that ...gave five terrorist hostages plus, who soon went back to battle, for traitor Sgt. Bergdahl!”
pageContext.analysis: The "Taliban Five" did not go back into battle. They have not returned to Afghanistan and have remained in Qatar since 2014. They have joined the Taliban's political office in Qatar where they are helping to negotiate a peace agreement with the United States.
